definition.name: Gitea Sync Secrets
definition.description: Copies secrets from the action's environment to many other repos.
definition.author: Bo-Yi Wu

inputs.name: gitea_token
inputs.description: Token to use to get repos and write secrets

inputs.name: gitea_server
inputs.description: The URL of the Gitea server to use.

inputs.name: repos
inputs.description: New line deliminated to select repositories to copy secrets to.

inputs.name: orgs
inputs.description: New line deliminated to select organizations to copy secrets to.

inputs.name: gitea_skip_verify
inputs.description:
When set to `true`, the action will skip SSL verification when making requests
to the Gitea API. Defaults to `false`.

inputs.name: secrets
inputs.description:
New line deliminated regex expressions to select values from `process.env`.
Use the action env to pass secrets from the repository in which this action
runs with the `env` attribute of the step.

inputs.name: dry_run
inputs.description: Run everything except for secret create and update functionality.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.description: Enable debug mode to output detailed logging information for troubleshooting.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.description:
If this value is set, the action will set the secrets to the repositories environment with the name of this value.
Only works if `target` is set to `actions` (default).

inputs.name: description
inputs.description: Optional description for the sync operation to help identify the purpose of this secrets synchronization.
